original_title: Adani Company officials call on Minister Harin
original_body_lines: A group of representatives of the Adani Company met with Tourism Minister Harin Fernando to discuss the upcoming work of the Adani in Sri Lanka.
Taking to Twitter, the Minister said Mr. Dhaval Shah and Mr. Manoj Deshmukh participated in the meeting.
During the meeting, the upcoming work of the Adani Company in Sri Lanka and a large solar panel project expected to be constructed in the country were discussed.
Sanath Jayasuriya, Sri Lanka Tourism Brand Ambassador, was also present at the meeting.
